p1: Welcome to Beetkom! Property lovers come together to discover their dream home. Beetkom will find your ideal residence where you will spend the future years peacefully. It will highlight the golden years of your life or assist you while you grow your career. Beetkom brand is open to stu¬¬¬¬dents, careerists, and families who are searching for accommodation. Its clients include anyone who is seeking a roof with ideal amenities.
p2: At Beetkom, the creators are focused on innovation. The application is dedicated to changing the way people think and search for homes. As technology is introduced into the real estate market, Beetkom was introduced for a seamless experience. The reason for the application came into existence when Beetkom saw the endless challenges people were facing in the property market.Beetkom is an envisioned platform that promotes communication between lenders and landlords. It connects the parties and creates a safe space for discovering their home. At the same time, they enjoy the personalized experience.Beetkom encourages users to step behind the scenes and watch the team hard at work! The staff is a group of committed experts who are working day and night to improve the user experience. In addition, we also incorporate the latest technology for a smooth property search. The results are efficient. Furthermore, every aspect is fulfilled with professionalism and precision.
p3: Beetkom was created with the primary belief that everyone has a smooth real estate experience. The technology introduced in the application results in hassle-free results. No one is misguided. The properties are not misrepresented.
p4: Beetkom values transparency and integrity. The application is dedicated to customer satisfaction.
p5: Thirdly, Beetkom has the core mission to educate the users with updated information. The application has the latest tools and data so the users can make an informed decision. The parameters assess the housing needs according to the user data.
p6: Beetkom is designed to minimize the distance between the tenants and the landlords. The application is perfect for individuals who are struggling to find a living space near their office, school, or workshop.
p7: Beetkom has extensive filters that make searching for properties a lot easier. You can search for properties according to rent or sale. Regardless, the process is challenge-free.
p8: The expert minds have introduced an advanced algorithm that comprehends the user’s preference. It understands the present and future needs of the users who are searching for property. In addition, Beetkom also offers property recommendations that align with the most recent research.
p9: Most property applications offer irrelevant searches, which leads to frustration. However, Beetkom is beyond that! The real estate application has simplified the search. You can look for the ideal property according to floor area, rooms, and number of residents. Finding your ideal home has never been easy!
p10: Are you ready for a transformative real estate journey? Download Beetkom today for a futuristic experience. Your dream home is at your fingertips.
p11: The term Beetkom is are trademarks of the creators. The relevant laws protect the service’s layout, design, and content. The client must not regenerate, post, display, or republish content without permission from Beetkom. The application is for commercial use only.
p12: When the user launches Beetkom, they agree to comply with laws and regulations. The legality includes but is not limited to real estate and data protection laws. Other relevant legislation in the jurisdiction is applied. Beetkom constantly updates its Terms of Use to protect the application from misuse.
p13: The client is responsible for practicing confidentiality. They must not share user account details and information with anyone. We are not responsible for unauthorized access from the client’s account. In addition, the client must quickly notify Beetkom if there is unlawful use or breach of security.
p14: The content, layout, and logo belong to Beetkom. The client is refrained from reproducing, rewording, or distributing the text. Furthermore, no creative derivatives are allowed. The client must seek permission first before manipulating the content.
p15: The client agrees to use Beetkom for legal and appropriate purposes. You must not violate the rights of others when using Beetkom. The client must refrain from spreading injustice and unlawful thoughts through the application. The user must not engage in fraudulent behavior or purposely disrupt the way Beetkom functions.
p16: Disputes and conflicts that arise from the use of Beetkom shall be supervised under the relevant laws. However, the user agrees not to use the application for malicious and unethical activities. Beetkom must not be used in unlawful means. Common examples are hacking, data mining, and other similar activities that harm the user or the application.
p17: Beetkom has the complete right to stop its services whenever they decide without notice. The application will not be held liable for an abrupt suspension regardless of the reasons. Its breach of the Terms of Use is part of the list of reasons. According to Beetkom, the terms that survive the termination will survive termination. For example, warranties, disclaimers, liability, ownership details, and indemnity. However, liability may change according to limitations.
p18: Kindly Browse the Terms of Use in detail for the (the Real Estate App) The Service supervised by Beetkom (“us,” “we,” or “our”) When you can access Beetkom, the actions mean you are complying with the Terms and use. The user accepts the terms. They are applicable to all users, visitors, and other individuals who are using Beetkom. If you are not happy with the Terms of Use, do not use Beetkom.
p19: Welcome to Beetkom, a real estate platform that is committed to simplifying the property experience. Its Privacy Policy contains how we gather, analyze, and safeguard information when the clients use the application.
p20: Beetkom promises to protect user information. The privacy policy focuses on educating the users and ensuring they receive credible information. Personal data for Beetkom includes email addresses, telephone numbers, usernames, and other unique details.
p21: Individuals who use Beetkom accept the data exchange and other elements. If you do not wish for the information to be shared or are uncomfortable with the privacy policy, do not use Beetkom.
p22: Beetkom collects information using voluntary submissions. Its secondary sources are automated means. The information is sent to the server that the client has provided during account creation or property searches. Interactions with the application are also considered. Moreover, cookies and similar features are also used in collecting information to assess user behavior.
p23: Beetkom may interact with third-party services for analytics. Furthermore, it may also hire outside parties for advertising and high-quality functionalities. Beetkom understands that third parties have their privacy policies. The applications encourage the users to peruse and review the details thoroughly. In short, Beetkom is not responsible for non-compliance of privacy policies with the third-party services.
p24: Beetkom stores the information and client details on its servers. It has installed high-quality industry protocols that prevent unauthorized access to the servers. Furthermore, Beetkom also uses SSL encryption to protect policy alterations, disclosures, and data manipulation. Beetkom will protect user information from hackers, sellers, and other malicious intruders.
p25: The application has the latest firewalls, encryption, and confidential tools. Furthermore, Beetkom uses SSL and TLS protocols to establish a secure connection between the server and the client. The exchange of information is encrypted with no third-party access. Thus, the transactions are secure.
p26: However, Beetkom does not promise absolute security. This is because no application or platform on the internet can safely communicate vertically. If you believe the back and forth has been compromised, immediately contact Beetkom by email.
p27: Personal details vary according to businesses and their needs. However, Beetkom pays close attention to names, email addresses, locations, and client preferences. The data is essential in providing customized services. It improves user experience and promotes communication.
p28: 1.  Geo-based information such as IP addresses, locations, devices, browsers, and bandwidth.
p29: 2.  Contact information such as addresses, names, and emails. Other elements that describe the scenarios are also collected.
p30: 3.  Date and Time of the website visit. Beetkom pays close attention to the version of the operating system and the languages.
p31: Beetkom collects data for promotional and commercial use. It aims to improve the quality of service. Furthermore, the privacy policy is consistent with the legal requirements. The information is utilized in drafting and negotiating future contracts with the Beetkom visitors.
p32: Beetkom stores user information and other elements to improve the app's functions. It will customize the user experience and communicate important updates to the clients. As a result, the user can take quick advantage of promotions, discounts, and lowered rents. Beetkom will not share user information for marketing reasons. Before doing so, Beetkom will seek permission. The consent depends on the user.
p33: Information collected during the sign-up process and searches is used to improve application functionality. Furthermore, it is also utilized to tailor searches and improve user experience. The data is aggregated at equal intervals to ensure consistency. Furthermore, the information is divided into anomalies and usual patterns for analytics. The data is retained for research purposes to study its implications on the market.
p34: Information is collected throughout the user processes. It is gathered during account creation and property searches. Furthermore, data is also collected because of the app-related interactions. Furthermore, cookies and analytical tools embedded in the user interface are also assessing user behavior.
p35: When using Beetkom, you agree that the information you post is valid and the truth. Furthermore, you give consent to the subsequent use and processing of information. In addition, the client has the right to remove consent at any time. You can do so by checking the app settings. Contact the customer support team for more details.
p36: From time to time, the Beetkom application will display links from other websites. However, these websites or portals are not managed by us. Therefore, the user must read their privacy policy before interacting with the links. If you are displeased with the performance, leave the third-party websites immediately. Beetkom will not influence or coerce your final decision. The policy is strictly and exclusively applicable to Beetkom.
p37: Beetkom will not share information about minors or the platform for fear of mistreatment or privacy violation. If you are a website user who is less than 13 or 16 years old and a California resident, then you need permission from the parent or garden. If Beetkom needs access, the minor must prove they have received the permission. Beetkom will not collect information from visitors who are underage (less than 13 years old)
p38: Are you searching for the best platform to display your property? Look no further than Beetkom. You can search for properties according to sales and rent. The customer service support team will make the process very simple for you. The clients can ring us at +970 597 861 621 for a lengthy discussion on how to publish the advertisement to the application,
p39: Our team members are available day and night to guide you throughout the process. They will help you with uploading the property details and doing other additional services such as virtual tours. We will guide how to take the perfect picture for the ad as well. Beetkom will turn the dream of reaching your target buyers into a reality. The tenants are just a call away!
p40: At Beetkom, we are committed to constant improvement. The feedback given by the clients improves the quality of our services. We will fix the issues promptly and customize the application to meet the needs. Beetkom also appreciates the customer's insight into the user’s mind. The information can play an essential role in shaping the application’s future.
p41: Beetkom stands out from the competitors by actively incorporating the client’s feedback into the development phases. We listen, learn, and incorporate the changes according to client preferences. We are committed to providing a user-centric platform that makes Beetkom the best in the market. Download it today for a customized and efficient real-estate experience.
p42: Beetkom is looking forward to hearing from you! The team welcomes questions, feedback, and concerns. We will also guide you into publishing property, so contact us via the phone number mentioned above. You will soon realize that Beetkom is a dedicated partner on the journey to discover the ideal property for your future.
